aboutIronandSteelJSON.heading: Growth of the Indian Steel Industry and Its Future Prospects
aboutIronandSteelJSON.description: The Indian steel industry has experienced significant growth due to the availability of essential raw materials like iron ore and the advantage of a cost-effective labour force. These factors have positioned the sector as a key contributor to India's manufacturing output. The industry boasts modern steel mills and has consistently undergone modernization to keep pace with global standards.
